name: https://www.bmlltech.com/

Their platform enables financial institutions to backtest trading strategies, perform advanced quantitative research, and analyze market dynamics by leveraging granular order book data. They cater to banks, asset managers, hedge funds, and trading venues, helping them to gain deeper insights into market behavior and improve their trading and investment decision-making processes.

name: https://recycleye.com/
summary: Recycleye is a tech company that develops advanced waste sorting solutions using artificial intelligence (AI) and machine vision to accurately identify and sort recyclable materials. name: https://www.sensat.co/
summary: Sensat is a technology company that creates digital representations of real-world locations.
